content: how do i use the camera in questcraft

In QuestCraft, you can use the camera by equipping it in your hotbar and then using it. To take a picture, simply right-click while holding the camera. The picture will be saved to your inventory.

where can i get a leash in minecraft

You can get a leash in Minecraft by crafting it using 4 strings and 1 slimeball, or by finding one in a village chest, or by trading with a villager.

what is the easiest way to get a slimeball

The easiest way to get a slimeball is by killing a slime mob. Slimes can be found in swamp biomes, usually at night, or in slime chunks which can be found by exploring caves or using a slime finder tool. You can also find slimeballs by trading with a villager or by exploring shipwrecks and woodland mansion chests, although these methods are less reliable.
